response:
{
  "menus": [
    {
      "name": "Ham and Cheese Rice Bowl",
      "description": "A simple and satisfying one-bowl meal with savory ham, melted cheese, and fluffy rice.",
      "servings": 1,
      "cookingTime": 25,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "rice: 0.75 cup",
        "ham: 100g",
        "cheese: 50g",
        "butter: 1 tbsp",
        "black pepper: pinch",
        "salt: pinch"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Cook rice according to package directions",
        "While rice cooks, dice ham into small cubes",
        "Shred or cube cheese depending on type",
        "When rice is done, fluff with fork and transfer to serving bowl",
        "Immediately top hot rice with butter and stir until melted",
        "Add diced ham on top and mix gently",
        "Sprinkle cheese over the rice mixture",
        "Cover bowl with plate for 1-2 minutes to let cheese melt from residual heat",
        "Season with salt and black pepper to taste",
        "Serve hot"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Cheesy Ham Fried Rice",
      "description": "A quick stir-fried rice dish with crispy ham pieces and melted cheese throughout.",
      "servings": 1,
      "cookingTime": 20,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "cooked rice: 1.5 cups",
        "ham: 100g",
        "cheese: 40g",
        "egg: 1",
        "vegetable oil: 2 tbsp",
        "soy sauce: 1 tbsp",
        "garlic powder: 0.25 tsp",
        "black pepper: pinch"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "If using fresh rice, spread on plate to cool for 10 minutes",
        "Dice ham into small pieces and shred cheese",
        "Beat egg in small bowl",
        "Heat wok or large pan over high heat, add 1 tbsp oil",
        "Add ham and stir-fry for 2 minutes until edges are slightly crispy",
        "Push ham to side, add remaining oil to center",
        "Pour in beaten egg and scramble quickly",
        "Add rice, breaking up any clumps with spatula",
        "Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, tossing constantly until rice is heated through",
        "Drizzle soy sauce around edge of pan and mix well",
        "Season with garlic powder and black pepper",
        "Turn off heat, add shredded cheese and toss quickly until cheese begins to melt",
        "Serve immediately while cheese is still gooey"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Ham and Cheese Rice Casserole",
      "description": "A comforting baked dish with layers of rice, ham, and melted cheese.",
      "servings": 1,
      "cookingTime": 45,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "rice: 0.5 cup",
        "ham: 80g",
        "cheese: 60g",
        "milk: 0.25 cup",
        "butter: 1 tbsp",
        "black pepper: 0.25 tsp",
        "salt: pinch"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F)",
        "Cook rice according to package directions",
        "Dice ham into small cubes",
        "Shred cheese and divide into two portions",
        "Grease small baking dish with half the butter",
        "Mix cooked rice with milk, half the cheese, ham, salt, and pepper",
        "Transfer mixture to baking dish and spread evenly",
        "Dot top with remaining butter",
        "Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top",
        "Cover dish with foil",
        "Bake for 20 minutes covered",
        "Remove foil and bake additional 5-7 minutes until cheese is golden and bubbly",
        "Let rest for 3 minutes before serving"
      ]
    }
  ]
}

{
  "menus": [
    {
      "name": "Spanish Tomato Rice",
      "description": "A flavorful one-pot rice dish with tomatoes and onions, seasoned to perfection.",
      "servings": 1,
      "cookingTime": 35,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "rice: 3/4 cup",
        "tomato: 2 medium",
        "onion: 1 medium",
        "garlic: 2 cloves",
        "vegetable oil: 2 tbsp",
        "salt: 1/2 tsp",
        "pepper: 1/4 tsp",
        "water: 1.5 cups"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Dice tomatoes and onion into small pieces, mince garlic",
        "Heat oil in a medium pot over medium heat",
        "Add onion and cook for 3-4 minutes until softened",
        "Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant",
        "Add diced tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes until they break down",
        "Add rice and stir to coat with the tomato mixture",
        "Pour in water, add salt and pepper, and stir well",
        "Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and cover",
        "Simmer for 18-20 minutes until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed",
        "Remove from heat and let rest covered for 5 minutes",
        "Fluff with a fork and serve"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Tomato Onion Rice Pilaf",
      "description": "A simple and aromatic rice dish with caramelized onions and fresh tomatoes.",
      "servings": 1,
      "cookingTime": 40,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "rice: 3/4 cup",
        "onion: 1 large",
        "tomato: 1 large",
        "vegetable oil: 2 tbsp",
        "water: 1.5 cups",
        "salt: 1/2 tsp",
        "pepper: 1/4 tsp"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Slice onion thinly and chop tomato",
        "Heat oil in a pot over medium heat",
        "Add sliced onion and cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden and caramelized",
        "Add chopped tomato and cook for 3-4 minutes until softened",
        "Add rice and stir for 1-2 minutes to toast slightly",
        "Pour in water, add salt and pepper",
        "Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to lowest setting and cover tightly",
        "Cook for 18 minutes without lifting the lid",
        "Remove from heat and let stand covered for 5 minutes",
        "Fluff with a fork and serve hot"
      ]
    }
  ]
}

{
  "menus": [
    {
      "name": "Spicy Mapo Tofu",
      "description": "A fiery Sichuan dish with silky tofu in a bold, aromatic chili sauce.",
      "servings": 1,
      "cookingTime": 25,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "tofu: 200g",
        "chili pepper: 2",
        "onion: 1 small",
        "garlic: 2 cloves",
        "ginger: 1 inch piece",
        "soy sauce: 2 tbsp",
        "vegetable oil: 2 tbsp",
        "cornstarch: 1 tsp",
        "water: 1/2 cup",
        "salt: pinch"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Cut tofu into small cubes and set aside",
        "Finely chop chili peppers, dice onion, mince garlic and ginger",
        "Mix cornstarch with 2 tbsp water to make a slurry",
        "Heat oil in a wok or large pan over medium-high heat",
        "Add onion and stir-fry for 2 minutes until softened",
        "Add garlic, ginger, and chili peppers, stir-fry for 1 minute until fragrant",
        "Add remaining water and soy sauce, bring to a simmer",
        "Gently add tofu cubes, reduce heat to medium and simmer for 5 minutes",
        "Stir in cornstarch slurry and cook for 1-2 minutes until sauce thickens",
        "Taste and adjust seasoning with salt if needed",
        "Serve hot over rice"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Spicy Eggplant Stir-Fry",
      "description": "Tender eggplant in a savory-spicy sauce with aromatic vegetables.",
      "servings": 1,
      "cookingTime": 30,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "eggplant: 1 medium",
        "chili pepper: 1-2",
        "onion: 1 small",
        "garlic: 3 cloves",
        "soy sauce: 2 tbsp",
        "vegetable oil: 3 tbsp",
        "sugar: 1 tsp",
        "water: 1/4 cup",
        "salt: pinch"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Cut eggplant into bite-sized cubes, sprinkle with salt and let sit for 10 minutes",
        "Rinse eggplant and pat dry with paper towels",
        "Slice chili peppers, dice onion, and mince garlic",
        "Heat 2 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat",
        "Add eggplant and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until golden and softened, remove and set aside",
        "Add remaining oil to wok, add onion and stir-fry for 2 minutes",
        "Add garlic and chili peppers, stir-fry for 30 seconds",
        "Return eggplant to wok, add soy sauce, sugar, and water",
        "Toss everything together and cook for 3-4 minutes until sauce reduces slightly",
        "Taste and adjust seasoning",
        "Serve immediately over rice"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Tofu and Eggplant in Chili Sauce",
      "description": "A hearty vegetarian dish combining silky tofu and tender eggplant in spicy sauce.",
      "servings": 1,
      "cookingTime": 35,
      "difficulty": "medium",
      "ingredients": [
        "tofu: 150g",
        "eggplant: 1 small",
        "chili pepper: 2",
        "onion: 1 small",
        "garlic: 2 cloves",
        "ginger: 1/2 inch piece",
        "soy sauce: 1.5 tbsp",
        "vegetable oil: 3 tbsp",
        "cornstarch: 1 tsp",
        "water: 1/3 cup",
        "pepper: pinch"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Cut tofu into cubes and eggplant into bite-sized pieces",
        "Salt eggplant lightly and let sit for 10 minutes, then rinse and pat dry",
        "Slice chili peppers, dice onion, mince garlic and ginger",
        "Mix cornstarch with 2 tbsp water",
        "Heat 2 tbsp oil in wok over medium-high heat",
        "Fry tofu cubes until golden on all sides, remove and set aside",
        "Add remaining oil, stir-fry eggplant for 5 minutes until softened, remove and set aside",
        "In same wok, add onion and cook for 2 minutes",
        "Add garlic, ginger, and chili peppers, stir-fry for 1 minute",
        "Add remaining water and soy sauce, bring to simmer",
        "Return tofu and eggplant to wok, toss gently to combine",
        "Stir in cornstarch slurry and cook until sauce thickens",
        "Season with pepper and serve hot"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
